name: The Traveller and The Bandit
description: Poverty and Lack are The Traveler and the Bandit they manifest themselves as real spiritual personalities. King Solomon drew a parable from a curious study of a circumstance and crystallized his observation in two places in his parables (Prov. 24.30-34/6.9-11). This booklet takes infant steps to trigger conversations and contemplative inquiry of the progressive and subtle intrusion of poverty and want. When the proverbs in question are unpacked studiously, we experience pertinent isolated principles that if mastered will lead to outwitting The Traveler and the Bandit. The three main strands unveiled in this short study reveal that Opportunities, Understanding and use of Time are a crucial threefold arsenal against lack. I invite you to leaf through its pages with the same curiosity and meditatively scribble the germs of truth that will spring up from your heart. May the Spirit of God use the noted ideas to instruct and help you search, find and understand the deep and hidden things of God, against poverty and want.
